Cleaniness: 100%

For cleaniness, amenities can be improved by increasing the quality and variety of services provided to customers. For Location, services such as shuttle services etc can be provided to customers to ensure they find it convenient to reach there. For services, staff can be trained for better customer service to ensure a more pleasant experience. For general sentiment, staff can be trained in terms of customer service to ensure customers feel welcome and ensured while enjoying their stay. For value, promotional packages and discounts can be provided by the Hotel to ensure customers can feel they received the best value out of their stay.
